sentences.en: “The modeling of methane hydrate is frankly in its infancy,” but it seems “robust to conclude” that mankind could “melt a significant fraction of the methane hydrates in the ocean,” they wrote.
sentences.cn: “坦率地说，甲烷水合物的建模工作尚处于起步阶段，”但它似乎“得出了有力的结论”，即人类的活动可能会“融化海洋中相当一部分的甲烷水合物，”他们这样写道。

sentences.en: After you run, drink plenty of water to stay well hydrated.
sentences.cn: 跑步后要多喝水，以保持体内水分充足。

sentences.en: After-sun products will cool and hydrate your skin.
sentences.cn: 晒后护肤品会清凉肌肤并为其补水。

sentences.en: Chloral hydrate is a rapidly effective hypnotic.
sentences.cn: 水合氯醛为一种作用迅速的催眠药.

sentences.en: Forming methane hydrate a quiescent system a slow and incomplete process.
sentences.cn: 静态体系生成甲烷水合物是个缓慢的、不完全的过程.

sentences.en: Gas hydrate is a kind of ice - like clathrate hydrate.
sentences.cn: 摘要气体水合物是一类笼形结构的冰状晶体.

sentences.en: Gas hydrate is a kind of ice clathrate hydrate.
sentences.cn: 气体水合物是一类笼形结构的冰状晶体.

sentences.en: Gas hydrate is an important potential resource in the 21 st century.
sentences.cn: 摘要天然气水合物甲烷资源量的估算是天然气水合物研究中的热点问题.

sentences.en: Marine gas hydrate is a great potential energy source.
sentences.cn: 海洋天然气水合物是一种潜在的巨大能源.

sentences.en: Moisten, Hydrate, Neutral PH, Increase Natural Plant Essence, Moisten Your Skin Completely.
sentences.cn: 滋润, 水合物, 中性条件下, 增加天然植物的精髓, 滋润你的皮肤彻底.

sentences.en: Natural gas hydrate contains 150 - 200 m ^ 3 of gas per m ^ 3 solid hydrate.
sentences.cn: 在标准状况下1立方公尺的气体水合物可储存150~200立方公尺的天然气.

sentences.en: Role of hydrate formation ocean disposal of carbon dioxide.
sentences.cn: 利用气体水合物解决二氧化问题.

sentences.en: Technology improvement of crude hydrazine hydrate refining procedure was introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了对粗水合肼精制工序的技术改造措施.

sentences.en: The hydrate plug - releasing measures and some problems on hydrate prevention are stressed.
sentences.cn: 针对已形成的水合物提出了解堵措施及水合物防治研究应注意的问题.

sentences.en: The industrial applications of the low dosage hydrate inhibitors were discussed.
sentences.cn: 简要介绍了低用量水合物抑制剂的应用状况.

sentences.en: The production process and technology progress of hydrazine hydrate were emphatically introduced.
sentences.cn: 重点介绍水合肼的生产工艺及技术进展.

sentences.en: You need to hydrate your skin, or it will become too dry.
sentences.cn: 你得给肌肤补水了, 不然肌肤会变得太干燥.

words.tran_cn: 与水化合；成水合物（hydrate的过去分词形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 水合氯醛；水合三氯乙醛
气体水合物，天然气水合物
消石灰；熟石灰（等于slaked lime）

trans.tran_en: a chemical substance that contains water
to supply someone or something with water to keep them healthy and in good condition
